## Data description

```{r}
print(paste("Number of students:", likert$student_id %>% unique() %>% length()))
print(paste("Number of likert questions:", likert$question %>% unique() %>% length()))
print(paste("Number of non-likert questions:", names(nonlikert)[!(names(nonlikert) %in% c("student_id", "study_group"))] %>% length()))
```

The distribution of answers by study year is presented below.

```{r}
ggplot(nonlikert, aes(x=study_group)) + 
  geom_bar() +
  geom_text(stat="count", aes(label=..count..), vjust=-1) +
  labs(x="Study group", y="Number of students", title="Number of students by study year")
```
